about_the_game:
Surmount is a free-flowing, physics-based platforming adventure where you’ll experience the joys of mountain climbing. Make your perilous ascent through the various handcrafted and procedurally generated challenges of Mount Om, all the while following a silly story with eccentric folks along the way.



Master your own unique style of climbing either alone or with a friend, upgrade and customize your climber to stand a better chance, and maybe just maybe, you'll be the first ever to reach the top!

Procedural & Handmade Levels

Be the first to reach the top of Mount Om, the highest mountain in the world. Discover an endless amount of unique climbing routes along the way.

Physics-Based Climbing

An approachable physics-based climbing system that is endlessly replayable and not overly punishing.

Meet eccentric characters

On your way to the top of Mount Om, you'll meet a variety of eccentric characters. All with their own reasons to journey to the top.

Items & Upgrades

Unlock a variety of permanent and equipable items that will boost your stats.

Customize Your Character

Be the most fashionable climber out there by customizing your character's look.

Solo or Duo!

Play on your own or tethered to a friend in local co-op.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (4 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 570 (4096 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
